items.title: Why More People Without Diabetes Are Using Glucose Monitors
items.description: Glucose monitors promise real-time insights into health, but data can be misleading without context. Here’s what to know before trying one.

items.title: Apple iPhone 16 Pro Prices Drop Even Further In New Offer Before iPhone 17 Release
items.description: As the days count down to the arrival of the next iPhones, it means that current renewed premium prices have dropped again.

items.title: CDC Sends Termination Notices To 600 Employees, Including 100 Working In Violence Prevention
items.description: The CDC sent termination notices to 600 employees, including 100 who prevent violence. This comes days after a fatal shooting at the CDC headquarters.

items.title: Guild, Beckham’s Former Esports Team, Folds After 6 Years
items.description: Just 13 days short of its iron anniversary, British competitive gaming outfit Guild Esports, once backed by David Beckham, has announced it’s shutting...

items.title: ‘Mortal Kombat: Legacy Kollection’ Confirms The Final Two Games
items.description: We finally know the full list of all eleven games and all 20 versions of Mortal Kombat included in the upcoming collection.
